name: Brackeys Game Jam 2022 WIP
description:
You can use the arrow keys and spacebar, or WASD and the left mouse button, whichever you prefer. I haven't tested it, but I think it should work with a controller, too. 

Keep Perry away from the envelopes flying around the room. If he reads one of those, your entire world will be flung into chaos! Throw the chairs and the table! Whatever it takes.
